; delay definitions
define delay delay0
"delay0=(d20-p1)/2"
define delay delay1
"delay1=d20-p1"
"l1=0"  ; start the evolution counter at 0

1   ze

2
d1 rpp1 rpp2 rpp3 rpp4
100u pl2:f2
(p1 ph0):f2
1.5u
4
delay0
(p1 ph1^):f2
delay1
(p1 ph2^):f2
delay1
(p1 ph3^):f2
delay1
(p1 ph4^):f2
delay0

lo to 4 times l1
(p1 ph5):f2
1.5u
1m
(p1 ph30):f2

go=2 ph31
1m wr #0 if #0

iu1
iu1
iu1

25m ip5*120

lo to 2 times td1

exit
ph0 = (360) 90 270

ph1 = (360) 100 50 180 220 170 300 340 290 60 100 50 180 220 170 300 340 290 60 100 50 180 220 170 300 340 290 60 100 50 180 220 170 300 340 290 60 100 50 180 220 170 300 340 290 60
ph2 = (360) 20 60 280 140 180 40 260 300 160 20 60 280 140 180 40 260 300 160 20 60 280 140 180 40 260 300 160 20 60 280 140 180 40 260 300 160 20 60 280 140 180 40 260 300 160
ph3 = (360) 30 250 290 150 10 50 270 130 170 30 250 290 150 10 50 270 130 170 30 250 290 150 10 50 270 130 170 30 250 290 150 10 50 270 130 170 30 250 290 150 10 50 270 130 170
ph4 = (360) 310 260 30 70 20 150 190 140 270 310 260 30 70 20 150 190 140 270 310 260 30 70 20 150 190 140 270 310 260 30 70 20 150 190 140 270 310 260 30 70 20 150 190 140 270

ph5 = (360) 280 100

ph30 = (360) 90 270
ph31 = 0 2
